statements: SELECT * FROM location_promotions
SELECT user_name, promotion_name, promotion_expiry FROM location_promotions
SELECT user_location, user_name FROM location_promotions WHERE promotion_expiry < '2023-01-01'
SELECT user_id, user_email FROM location_promotions ORDER BY user_id DESC
SELECT DISTINCT user_location FROM location_promotions
SELECT user_name, user_email, promotion_name FROM location_promotions WHERE user_location='New York';
SELECT user_name, user_email, promotion_name, promotion_expiry FROM location_promotions WHERE user_location LIKE 'C%';
SELECT user_id, user_name, user_email, promotion_name, promotion_description FROM location_promotions WHERE promotion_expiry > '2022-01-01';
SELECT promotion_name, user_name FROM location_promotions WHERE user_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT user_id, user_name, promotion_name, promotion_expiry FROM location_promotions WHERE user_location='Los Angeles' AND promotion_expiry < '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM UserLocations;
SELECT user_id, name FROM UserLocations WHERE latitude > 40.0;
SELECT user_id, name, latitude, longitude FROM UserLocations ORDER BY latitude DESC;
SELECT promo_name, description FROM Promotions WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT promo_id, promo_name, location_id FROM Promotions WHERE description LIKE '%discount%';
SELECT user_id, name, latitude, longitude FROM UserLocations WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM UserLocations WHERE latitude > 40;
SELECT user_id, name, latitude, longitude FROM UserLocations ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Promotions WHERE location_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM UserLocations WHERE longitude < 0);
SELECT user_id, name, latitude, longitude FROM UserLocations WHERE latitude BETWEEN 30 AND 50;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, location_point FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT promotion_name, discount_amount FROM promotions WHERE discount_amount >= 0.2;
SELECT * FROM users JOIN products ON users.location_point = products.location_point;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE product_name LIKE 'A%' OR product_name LIKE 'B%';
SELECT promotion_id, promotion_name FROM promotions ORDER BY promotion_name;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE location = POINT(40.7128, -74.0060);
SELECT promotion_name, start_date, end_date FROM promotions WHERE location_allowed IS NOT NULL;
SELECT promotion_id, promotion_name, start_date, end_date FROM promotions ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, action_type, action_date FROM user_actions WHERE action_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE location = POINT(10, 20);
SELECT promotion_name, start_date, end_date FROM promotions WHERE location_allowed IS NOT NULL;
SELECT user_id, action_type, action_date FROM user_actions ORDER BY action_date DESC;

SELECT u.username, p.promotion_name, ud.deal_date FROM users u JOIN user_deals ud ON u.user_id = ud.user_id JOIN promotions p ON ud.promotion_id = p.promotion_id WHERE u.location = POINT(30, 40) AND ud.deal_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM locations;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM locations ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT promo_name, start_date, end_date FROM promotions WHERE location_id = 3;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT deal_name, deal_value FROM deals WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM locations ORDER BY location_name DESC, latitude ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE location_id = 3 OR location_id = 5;
SELECT promo_name, promo_details, start_date, end_date FROM promotions WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT activity_id, user_id, activity_type, activity_date FROM user_activities WHERE activity_type LIKE '%login%' AND activity_date > '2022-06-01' ORDER BY activity_date ASC;
SELECT deal_name, deal_description, deal_value FROM deals WHERE start_date < '2022-10-01' AND end_date > '2022-12-31' ORDER BY deal_value DESC, end_date ASC LIMIT 5;
